microdata.description: A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. 7000 series aluminum and stronger cover glass. An A9 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. All new 12MP iSight camera with Live Photos. Touch ID. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi. Long battery life and iOS 9 and iCloud. All in a smooth, continuous unibody design.
name: Apple - iPhone 6s 64GB - Space Gray (Verizon Wireless)

reviews.author: kjkeane
reviews.description: We have had no problems with this phone. It is very easy to use.
reviews.name: easy to use

reviews.author: LilD
reviews.description: What can I said, its an IPhone and my son's loves it, great pics and enough space for his games and music.
reviews.name: Its an IPone

reviews.author: Drandy
reviews.description: Really a great purchase. Just the size for me and is super fast. The pictures and video is remarkable for a phone. Would recommend to anyone.
reviews.name: Right size with speed

reviews.author: Dawn
reviews.description: When I turn my volume down I have to restart my phone to get a ringtone back .
reviews.name: Not happy

reviews.author: Msjoey
reviews.description: Purchased for my 15 year old as his first phone and he's had no complaints.
reviews.name: We are an Apple family

reviews.author: nick6413
reviews.description: I always liked my iPhone but was skeptical over the increased size. But the slim body and added length are no problem. Like the new style and model. Great features.
reviews.name: Great camera update and overall phone.

reviews.author: Desy
reviews.description: Easy to use; good battery life; great camera; nice size
reviews.name: Love it

reviews.author: Kimfusion
reviews.description: Switched to a Samsung Note 4 two years ago to try something new. Had problems with it and hated it. Recently went back to iPhone and I'll never switch again. I love it!
reviews.name: Love my iPhone 6s!

reviews.author: Jax39
reviews.description: I love my new iPhone 6c it's fast and efficient, except for the shatter proof screen 2 weeks I went before I broke it by dropping it out of my pocket.
reviews.name: iPhone 6s

reviews.author: Panda
reviews.description: I only buy Apple products, I wouldn't use anything else. Love this phone, I really like the Touch ID
reviews.name: Love Apple Products
